title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.19 - Incomplete finishes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4122.19 - Incomplete finishes

State Regulations
(a) When
only two horses finish a race the show pool, if any, shall be distributed the
same as in a place pool. (b) When
only one horse finishes a race the place and show pools, if any, shall be
distributed the same as in a win pool. (c) In any race in which no horses finish, all money wagered on the race shall be refunded. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4122.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
